profile.name: siddontang
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | PingCAP
profile.summary: Results-driven software engineer with a passion for database systems and Rust programming. Proven track record of delivering high-quality projects and contributing to open-source initiatives.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Developed and maintained TiKV gRPC protocols demo, sqlparser-rs, tidbparser-rs, shuttle-tidb-demo, and mini-redis projects using Rust systems programming.
Experimented with Go and C++ for RocksDB and DuckDB extensions.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Worked on various Next.js demos, TiDB Cloud Serverless Tier, and Vercel demos.
Contributed to open-source projects and maintained repositories.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Maintained and updated various open-source projects, including TiDB Cloud Serverless Tier.
Engaged with the community through GitHub comments and pull requests.
